title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: I’m a single parent in my 50s. Should I add my adult children, 23 and 29, to my mortgage loan to help me qualify?
items.description: “I want to purchase a family home so we three don’t have to pay rent.”

items.title: ‘It’s keeping me up at night’: My brother sold his share of the family farm and lost the rest in a divorce. He says I owe him.
items.description: “He told me that he will legally pursue me and my farm through the court.”

items.title: Fed governor Cook declared second residence as ‘vacation home,’ countering Trump’s claims

items.title: I’m 67. My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. How do I teach her to manage our money? After all, I won’t be around forever.
items.description: “We have a 12-year-old daughter. I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash.”

items.title: My boyfriend, 69, moved in. He refuses to pay more than $1,300 in rent and won’t do yard work. What should I do?
items.description: “It’s clear that he seems to think that if I die, that he should inherit the house. That is NOT my plan.”

items.title: Sachem Head is pushing for a Performance Food merger. Here's why a deal makes sense
items.description: While there is an opportunity to improve Performance Food's profitability, the main catalyst here is a potential merger with US Foods.
